sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { XCircle, Download, Mail, CreditCard } from 'lucide-react'; const InvoiceModal = ({ invoice, onClose }) => { if (!invoice) return null; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'paid': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'outstanding': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'overdue': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'partial': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; const handleEmailInvoice = () => { // This would integrate with your email service alert('Email functionality would be implemented here'); }; const handleRecordPayment = () => { // This would open a payment recording modal alert('Payment recording functionality would be implemented here'); }; return (

Invoice Details - {invoice.id}

{invoice.balance > 0 && ( )}
{/* Invoice Header */}

Invoice Information

Invoice Number: {invoice.id}
Date: {invoice.date}
Due Date: {invoice.dueDate}
Payment Terms: {invoice.paymentTerms} days
Source: {invoice.source}
Status: {invoice.status}
{invoice.daysOverdue > 0 && (
Days Overdue: {invoice.daysOverdue} days
)}

Customer Information

Customer:

{invoice.customerName}

Customer ID:

{invoice.customerId}

{/* Line Items */}

Line Items

{invoice.items.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Description Quantity Unit Price Total
{item.description} {item.quantity} ${item.price.toFixed(2)} ${item.total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Invoice Totals */}
Subtotal: ${invoice.amount.toFixed(2)}
Amount Paid: ${invoice.paid.toFixed(2)}
Balance Due: 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-green-600'}`}> ${invoice.balance.toFixed(2)}
{/* Notes */} {invoice.notes && (

Notes

{invoice.notes}

)} {/* Payment Information */} {invoice.paid > 0 && (

Payment Information

Amount Paid:

${invoice.paid.toFixed(2)}

Remaining Balance:

${invoice.balance.toFixed(2)}

)} {/* Overdue Warning */} {invoice.status === 'overdue' && (

Payment Overdue

This invoice is {invoice.daysOverdue} days overdue. Please contact the customer for immediate payment.

)} {/* Payment History Section */} {invoice.paymentHistory && invoice.paymentHistory.length > 0 && (

Payment History

{invoice.paymentHistory.map((payment, index) => ( ))}
Date Method Amount Reference
{payment.date} {payment.method.replace('_', ' ')} ${payment.amount.toFixed(2)} {payment.reference || '-'}
)} {/* Footer Actions */}

Created: {invoice.date}

Last Updated: {invoice.updatedAt || invoice.date}

{invoice.status !== 'paid' && ( )}
); }; export default InvoiceModal;
